description: Modifies the cluster configuration of the specified Elasticsearch domain, setting as setting the instance type and the number of instances.

parameters.name: DomainName
parameters.description: The name of the Elasticsearch domain that you are updating.

parameters.name: ElasticsearchClusterConfig
parameters.description: The type and number of instances to instantiate for the domain cluster. InstanceType (string) --- The instance type for an Elasticsearch cluster. UltraWarm instance types are not supported for data instances. InstanceCount (integer) --- The number of instances in the specified domain cluster. DedicatedMasterEnabled (boolean) --- A boolean value to indicate whether a dedicated master node is enabled. See About Dedicated Master Nodes for more information. ZoneAwarenessEnabled (boolean) --- A boolean value to indicate whether zone awareness is enabled. See About Zone Awareness for more information. ZoneAwarenessConfig (dict) --- Specifies the zone awareness configuration for a domain when zone awareness is enabled. AvailabilityZoneCount (integer) --- An integer value to indicate the number of availability zones for a domain when zone awareness is enabled. This should be equal to number of subnets if VPC endpoints is enabled DedicatedMasterType (string) --- The instance type for a dedicated master node. DedicatedMasterCount (integer) --- Total number of dedicated master nodes, active and on standby, for the cluster. WarmEnabled (boolean) --- True to enable warm storage. WarmType (string) --- The instance type for the Elasticsearch cluster's warm nodes. WarmCount (integer) --- The number of warm nodes in the cluster. ColdStorageOptions (dict) --- Specifies the ColdStorageOptions config for Elasticsearch Domain Enable cold storage option. Accepted values true or false.

nested_params.name: InstanceType
nested_params.description: The instance type for an Elasticsearch cluster. UltraWarm instance types are not supported for data instances.

nested_params.name: InstanceCount
nested_params.description: The number of instances in the specified domain cluster.

nested_params.name: DedicatedMasterEnabled
nested_params.description: A boolean value to indicate whether a dedicated master node is enabled. See About Dedicated Master Nodes for more information.

nested_params.name: ZoneAwarenessEnabled
nested_params.description: A boolean value to indicate whether zone awareness is enabled. See About Zone Awareness for more information.

nested_params.name: ZoneAwarenessConfig
nested_params.description: Specifies the zone awareness configuration for a domain when zone awareness is enabled.

nested_params.name: AvailabilityZoneCount
nested_params.description: An integer value to indicate the number of availability zones for a domain when zone awareness is enabled. This should be equal to number of subnets if VPC endpoints is enabled.

nested_params.name: DedicatedMasterType
nested_params.description: The instance type for a dedicated master node.

nested_params.name: DedicatedMasterCount
nested_params.description: Total number of dedicated master nodes, active and on standby, for the cluster.

nested_params.name: WarmEnabled
nested_params.description: True to enable warm storage.

nested_params.name: WarmType
nested_params.description: The instance type for the Elasticsearch cluster's warm nodes.

nested_params.name: WarmCount
nested_params.description: The number of warm nodes in the cluster.

nested_params.name: ColdStorageOptions
nested_params.description: Specifies the ColdStorageOptions config for Elasticsearch Domain.

nested_params.name: Enabled
nested_params.description: Enable cold storage option. Accepted values true or false.

parameters.name: EBSOptions
parameters.description: Specify the type and size of the EBS volume that you want to use. EBSEnabled (boolean) --- Specifies whether EBS-based storage is enabled. VolumeType (string) --- Specifies the volume type for EBS-based storage. VolumeSize (integer) --- Integer to specify the size of an EBS volume. Iops (integer) --- Specifies the IOPS for Provisioned IOPS And GP3 EBS volume (SSD). Throughput (integer) --- Specifies the Throughput for GP3 EBS volume (SSD).

nested_params.name: EBSEnabled
nested_params.description: Specifies whether EBS-based storage is enabled.

nested_params.name: VolumeType
nested_params.description: Specifies the volume type for EBS-based storage.

nested_params.name: VolumeSize
nested_params.description: Integer to specify the size of an EBS volume.

nested_params.name: Iops
nested_params.description: Specifies the IOPS for Provisioned IOPS And GP3 EBS volume (SSD).

nested_params.name: Throughput
nested_params.description: Specifies the Throughput for GP3 EBS volume (SSD).

parameters.name: SnapshotOptions
parameters.description: Option to set the time, in UTC format, for the daily automated snapshot. Default value is 0 hours. AutomatedSnapshotStartHour (integer) --- Specifies the time, in UTC format, when the service takes a daily automated snapshot of the specified Elasticsearch domain. Default value is 0 hours.

nested_params.name: AutomatedSnapshotStartHour
nested_params.description: Specifies the time, in UTC format, when the service takes a daily automated snapshot of the specified Elasticsearch domain. Default value is 0 hours.

parameters.name: VPCOptions
parameters.description: Options to specify the subnets and security groups for VPC endpoint. For more information, see Creating a VPC in VPC Endpoints for Amazon Elasticsearch Service Domains SubnetIds (list) --- Specifies the subnets for VPC endpoint. (string) --- SecurityGroupIds (list) --- Specifies the security groups for VPC endpoint. (string) ---

nested_params.name: SubnetIds
nested_params.description: Specifies the subnets for VPC endpoint.

nested_params.name: SecurityGroupIds
nested_params.description: Specifies the security groups for VPC endpoint.

parameters.name: CognitoOptions
parameters.description: Options to specify the Cognito user and identity pools for Kibana authentication. For more information, see Amazon Cognito Authentication for Kibana. Enabled (boolean) --- Specifies the option to enable Cognito for Kibana authentication. UserPoolId (string) --- Specifies the Cognito user pool ID for Kibana authentication. IdentityPoolId (string) --- Specifies the Cognito identity pool ID for Kibana authentication. RoleArn (string) --- Specifies the role ARN that provides Elasticsearch permissions for accessing Cognito resources.

nested_params.name: Enabled
nested_params.description: Specifies the option to enable Cognito for Kibana authentication.

nested_params.name: UserPoolId
nested_params.description: Specifies the Cognito user pool ID for Kibana authentication.

nested_params.name: IdentityPoolId
nested_params.description: Specifies the Cognito identity pool ID for Kibana authentication.

nested_params.name: RoleArn
nested_params.description: Specifies the role ARN that provides Elasticsearch permissions for accessing Cognito resources.

parameters.name: AdvancedOptions
parameters.description: Modifies the advanced option to allow references to indices in an HTTP request body. Must be false when configuring access to individual sub-resources. By default, the value is true. See Configuration Advanced Options for more information. (string) --- (string) ---

parameters.name: LogPublishingOptions
parameters.description: Map of LogType and LogPublishingOption, each containing options to publish a given type of Elasticsearch log. (string) --- Type of Log File, it can be one of the following: INDEX_SLOW_LOGS: Index slow logs contain insert requests that took more time than configured index query log threshold to execute. SEARCH_SLOW_LOGS: Search slow logs contain search queries that took more time than configured search query log threshold to execute. ES_APPLICATION_LOGS: Elasticsearch application logs contain information about errors and warnings raised during the operation of the service and can be useful for troubleshooting. AUDIT_LOGS: Audit logs contain records of user requests for access from the domain. (dict) --- Log Publishing option that is set for given domain. Attributes and their details: CloudWatchLogsLogGroupArn: ARN of the Cloudwatch log group to which log needs to be published. Enabled: Whether the log publishing for given log type is enabled or not CloudWatchLogsLogGroupArn (string) --- ARN of the Cloudwatch log group to which log needs to be published. Enabled (boolean) --- Specifies whether given log publishing option is enabled or not.

parameters.name: DomainEndpointOptions
parameters.description: Options to specify configuration that will be applied to the domain endpoint. EnforceHTTPS (boolean) --- Specify if only HTTPS endpoint should be enabled for the Elasticsearch domain. TLSSecurityPolicy (string) --- Specify the TLS security policy that needs to be applied to the HTTPS endpoint of Elasticsearch domain. It can be one of the following values: Policy-Min-TLS-1-0-2019-07: TLS security policy that supports TLS version 1.0 to TLS version 1.2 Policy-Min-TLS-1-2-2019-07: TLS security policy that supports only TLS version 1.2 Policy-Min-TLS-1-2-PFS-2023-10: TLS security policy that supports TLS version 1.2 to TLS version 1.3 with perfect forward secrecy cipher suites CustomEndpointEnabled (boolean) --- Specify if custom endpoint should be enabled for the Elasticsearch domain. CustomEndpoint (string) --- Specify the fully qualified domain for your custom endpoint. CustomEndpointCertificateArn (string) --- Specify ACM certificate ARN for your custom endpoint.

nested_params.name: EnforceHTTPS
nested_params.description: Specify if only HTTPS endpoint should be enabled for the Elasticsearch domain.

nested_params.name: TLSSecurityPolicy
nested_params.description: Specify the TLS security policy that needs to be applied to the HTTPS endpoint of Elasticsearch domain. It can be one of the following values:

nested_params.name: CustomEndpointEnabled
nested_params.description: Specify if custom endpoint should be enabled for the Elasticsearch domain.

nested_params.name: CustomEndpoint
nested_params.description: Specify the fully qualified domain for your custom endpoint.

nested_params.name: CustomEndpointCertificateArn
nested_params.description: Specify ACM certificate ARN for your custom endpoint.

parameters.name: AdvancedSecurityOptions
parameters.description: Specifies advanced security options. Enabled (boolean) --- True if advanced security is enabled. InternalUserDatabaseEnabled (boolean) --- True if the internal user database is enabled. MasterUserOptions (dict) --- Credentials for the master user: username and password, ARN, or both. MasterUserARN (string) --- ARN for the master user (if IAM is enabled). MasterUserName (string) --- The master user's username, which is stored in the Amazon Elasticsearch Service domain's internal database. MasterUserPassword (string) --- The master user's password, which is stored in the Amazon Elasticsearch Service domain's internal database. SAMLOptions (dict) --- Specifies the SAML application configuration for the domain. Enabled (boolean) --- True if SAML is enabled. Idp (dict) --- Specifies the SAML Identity Provider's information. The Metadata of the SAML application in xml format. The unique Entity ID of the application in SAML Identity Provider. MasterUserName (string) --- The SAML master username, which is stored in the Amazon Elasticsearch Service domain's internal database. MasterBackendRole (string) --- The backend role to which the SAML master user is mapped to. SubjectKey (string) --- The key to use for matching the SAML Subject attribute. RolesKey (string) --- The key to use for matching the SAML Roles attribute. SessionTimeoutMinutes (integer) --- The duration, in minutes, after which a user session becomes inactive. Acceptable values are between 1 and 1440, and the default value is 60. AnonymousAuthEnabled (boolean) --- True if Anonymous auth is enabled. Anonymous auth can be enabled only when AdvancedSecurity is enabled on existing domains.

nested_params.name: Enabled
nested_params.description: True if advanced security is enabled.

nested_params.name: InternalUserDatabaseEnabled
nested_params.description: True if the internal user database is enabled.

nested_params.name: MasterUserOptions
nested_params.description: Credentials for the master user: username and password, ARN, or both.

nested_params.name: MasterUserARN
nested_params.description: ARN for the master user (if IAM is enabled).

nested_params.name: MasterUserName
nested_params.description: The master user's username, which is stored in the Amazon Elasticsearch Service domain's internal database.

nested_params.name: MasterUserPassword
nested_params.description: The master user's password, which is stored in the Amazon Elasticsearch Service domain's internal database.

nested_params.name: SAMLOptions
nested_params.description: Specifies the SAML application configuration for the domain.

nested_params.name: Enabled
nested_params.description: True if SAML is enabled.

nested_params.name: Idp
nested_params.description: Specifies the SAML Identity Provider's information.

nested_params.name: MetadataContent
nested_params.description: The Metadata of the SAML application in xml format.

nested_params.name: EntityId
nested_params.description: The unique Entity ID of the application in SAML Identity Provider.

nested_params.name: MasterUserName
nested_params.description: The SAML master username, which is stored in the Amazon Elasticsearch Service domain's internal database.

nested_params.name: MasterBackendRole
nested_params.description: The backend role to which the SAML master user is mapped to.

nested_params.name: SubjectKey
nested_params.description: The key to use for matching the SAML Subject attribute.

nested_params.name: RolesKey
nested_params.description: The key to use for matching the SAML Roles attribute.

nested_params.name: SessionTimeoutMinutes
nested_params.description: The duration, in minutes, after which a user session becomes inactive. Acceptable values are between 1 and 1440, and the default value is 60.

nested_params.name: AnonymousAuthEnabled
nested_params.description: True if Anonymous auth is enabled. Anonymous auth can be enabled only when AdvancedSecurity is enabled on existing domains.

parameters.name: NodeToNodeEncryptionOptions
parameters.description: Specifies the NodeToNodeEncryptionOptions. Enabled (boolean) --- Specify true to enable node-to-node encryption.

nested_params.name: Enabled
nested_params.description: Specify true to enable node-to-node encryption.

parameters.name: EncryptionAtRestOptions
parameters.description: Specifies the Encryption At Rest Options. Enabled (boolean) --- Specifies the option to enable Encryption At Rest. KmsKeyId (string) --- Specifies the KMS Key ID for Encryption At Rest options.

nested_params.name: Enabled
nested_params.description: Specifies the option to enable Encryption At Rest.

nested_params.name: KmsKeyId
nested_params.description: Specifies the KMS Key ID for Encryption At Rest options.

parameters.name: AutoTuneOptions
parameters.description: Specifies Auto-Tune options. DesiredState (string) --- Specifies the Auto-Tune desired state. Valid values are ENABLED, DISABLED. RollbackOnDisable (string) --- Specifies the rollback state while disabling Auto-Tune for the domain. Valid values are NO_ROLLBACK, DEFAULT_ROLLBACK. MaintenanceSchedules (list) --- Specifies list of maitenance schedules. See the Developer Guide for more information. (dict) --- Specifies Auto-Tune maitenance schedule. StartAt (datetime) --- Specifies timestamp at which Auto-Tune maintenance schedule start. Duration (dict) --- Specifies maintenance schedule duration: duration value and duration unit. Value (integer) --- Integer to specify the value of a maintenance schedule duration. Unit (string) --- Specifies the unit of a maintenance schedule duration. Valid value is HOURS. CronExpressionForRecurrence (string) --- Specifies cron expression for a recurring maintenance schedule. See the Developer Guide for more information.

nested_params.name: DesiredState
nested_params.description: Specifies the Auto-Tune desired state. Valid values are ENABLED, DISABLED.

nested_params.name: RollbackOnDisable
nested_params.description: Specifies the rollback state while disabling Auto-Tune for the domain. Valid values are NO_ROLLBACK, DEFAULT_ROLLBACK.

nested_params.name: MaintenanceSchedules
nested_params.description: Specifies list of maitenance schedules. See the Developer Guide for more information.

nested_params.name: StartAt
nested_params.description: Specifies timestamp at which Auto-Tune maintenance schedule start.

nested_params.name: Duration
nested_params.description: Specifies maintenance schedule duration: duration value and duration unit. See the Developer Guide for more information.

nested_params.name: Value
nested_params.description: Integer to specify the value of a maintenance schedule duration. See the Developer Guide for more information.

nested_params.name: Unit
nested_params.description: Specifies the unit of a maintenance schedule duration. Valid value is HOURS. See the Developer Guide for more information.

nested_params.name: CronExpressionForRecurrence
nested_params.description: Specifies cron expression for a recurring maintenance schedule. See the Developer Guide for more information.

SEARCH_SLOW_LOGS: Search slow logs contain search queries that took more time than configured search query log threshold to execute.
ES_APPLICATION_LOGS: Elasticsearch application logs contain information about errors and warnings raised during the operation of the service and can be useful for troubleshooting.
AUDIT_LOGS: Audit logs contain records of user requests for access from the domain.

nested_items.description: The Metadata of the SAML application in xml format.

nested_items.name: EntityId
nested_items.description: The unique Entity ID of the application in SAML Identity Provider.

nested_items.name: SubjectKey
nested_items.description: The key used for matching the SAML Subject attribute.

nested_items.name: RolesKey
nested_items.description: The key used for matching the SAML Roles attribute.

nested_items.name: SessionTimeoutMinutes
nested_items.description: The duration, in minutes, after which a user session becomes inactive.

nested_items.name: AnonymousAuthDisableDate
nested_items.description: Specifies the Anonymous Auth Disable Date when Anonymous Auth is enabled.

nested_items.name: AnonymousAuthEnabled
nested_items.description: True if Anonymous auth is enabled. Anonymous auth can be enabled only when AdvancedSecurity is enabled on existing domains.

nested_items.name: CreationDate
nested_items.description: Timestamp which tells the creation date for the entity.

nested_items.name: UpdateDate
nested_items.description: Timestamp which tells the last updated time for the entity.

nested_items.name: UpdateVersion
nested_items.description: Specifies the latest version for the entity.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: Provides the OptionState for the Elasticsearch domain.

nested_items.name: PendingDeletion
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the Elasticsearch domain is being deleted.

nested_items.name: AutoTuneOptions
nested_items.description: Specifies AutoTuneOptions for the domain.

nested_items.name: DesiredState
nested_items.description: Specifies the Auto-Tune desired state. Valid values are ENABLED, DISABLED.

nested_items.name: RollbackOnDisable
nested_items.description: Specifies the rollback state while disabling Auto-Tune for the domain. Valid values are NO_ROLLBACK, DEFAULT_ROLLBACK.

nested_items.name: MaintenanceSchedules
nested_items.description: Specifies list of maitenance schedules. See the Developer Guide for more information.

nested_items.name: StartAt
nested_items.description: Specifies timestamp at which Auto-Tune maintenance schedule start.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: Integer to specify the value of a maintenance schedule duration. See the Developer Guide for more information.

nested_items.name: Unit
nested_items.description: Specifies the unit of a maintenance schedule duration. Valid value is HOURS. See the Developer Guide for more information.

nested_items.name: CronExpressionForRecurrence
nested_items.description: Specifies cron expression for a recurring maintenance schedule. See the Developer Guide for more information.

nested_items.name: CreationDate
nested_items.description: Timestamp which tells Auto-Tune options creation date .

nested_items.name: UpdateDate
nested_items.description: Timestamp which tells Auto-Tune options last updated time.

nested_items.name: UpdateVersion
nested_items.description: Specifies the Auto-Tune options latest version.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: Specifies the AutoTuneState for the Elasticsearch domain.

nested_items.name: ErrorMessage
nested_items.description: Specifies the error message while enabling or disabling the Auto-Tune options.

nested_items.name: PendingDeletion
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the Elasticsearch domain is being deleted.

nested_items.name: ChangeProgressDetails
nested_items.description: Specifies change details of the domain configuration change.

nested_items.name: ChangeId
nested_items.description: The unique change identifier associated with a specific domain configuration change.

nested_items.name: Message
nested_items.description: Contains an optional message associated with the domain configuration change.

nested_items.name: ConfigChangeStatus
nested_items.description: The current status of the configuration change.

nested_items.name: StartTime
nested_items.description: The time that the configuration change was initiated, in Universal Coordinated Time (UTC).

nested_items.name: LastUpdatedTime
nested_items.description: The last time that the configuration change was updated.

nested_items.name: InitiatedBy
nested_items.description: The IAM principal who initiated the configuration change.

nested_items.name: ModifyingProperties
nested_items.description: Information about the domain properties that are currently being modified.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the property that is currently being modified.

nested_items.name: ActiveValue
nested_items.description: The current value of the domain property that is being modified.

nested_items.name: PendingValue
nested_items.description: The value that the property that is currently being modified will eventually have.

nested_items.name: ValueType
nested_items.description: The type of value that is currently being modified. Properties can have two types:

nested_items.name: DryRunResults
nested_items.description: Contains result of DryRun.

nested_items.name: DeploymentType
nested_items.description: Specifies the deployment mechanism through which the update shall be applied on the domain. Possible responses are Blue/Green (The update will require a blue/green deployment.) DynamicUpdate (The update can be applied in-place without a Blue/Green deployment required.) Undetermined (The domain is undergoing an update which needs to complete before the deployment type can be predicted.) None (The configuration change matches the current configuration and will not result in any update.)

nested_items.name: Message
nested_items.description: Contains an optional message associated with the DryRunResults.
